## WritableSignal interface

Represents a store that implements both [ReadableSignal](./tansu.readablesignal.md) and [Writable](./tansu.writable.md)<!-- -->. This is the type of objects returned by [writable()](./tansu.writable.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface WritableSignal<T, U = T> extends ReadableSignal<T>, Writable<T, U> 
```
**Extends:** [ReadableSignal](./tansu.readablesignal.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;, [Writable](./tansu.writable.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, U&gt;
